text:
Company: Mcclain-Gutierrez  
Role: Standards Specialist  

Company Background:  
Mcclain-Gutierrez is a leading consultancy firm specializing in quality management and standards implementation. Our diverse team works collaboratively to provide top-tier services to a broad range of industries.

Job Type:  
Full-time

Job Description:  
We are seeking a Standards Specialist to join our dynamic team. The primary responsibility of this role is to ensure all quality management systems, processes, and practices comply with established standards and regulations. The successful candidate will work closely with various departments to implement and maintain these standards effectively.

Responsibilities:  
- Develop and implement quality management systems.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with relevant standards.
- Collaborate with team members and external partners to improve processes.
- Provide training and support on quality standards and best practices.
- Prepare and present detailed reports on compliance and improvement areas.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Quality Management, Engineering, or a related field.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in quality management or a related role.
- Strong understanding of quality management systems and standards.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
- Certification in ISO standards is a plus.

Perks and Benefits:  
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $70,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and company holidays.
- Professional development and training opportunities.
- Inclusive and supportive work environment.

Application Instructions:  
All qualified applicants are encouraged to apply, regardless of background. We value the diverse experiences that our employees bring and are proud to be an inclusive employer. Please submit your resume and cover letter via our online portal.
